sentences.english: How does schoolgirl menses eat really not fat?

sentences.english: ‘We tend to have more emotional or nightmarish dreams just before a period.’

sentences.english: Body temperature rises after ovulation and drops just before a period.

sentences.english: Examination should be done within 3 days after menstruation clears up.

definition: to stop menstruating (as a result of pregnancy, menopause or medical condition etc)
postnatal period/puerperium (period of six weeks after childbirth)
luteal phase (period in the menstrual cycle when an embryo can implant in the womb)
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
